member.name: T:NReco.Logging.File.FileLogger
member.summary: Generic file logger that works in a similar way to standard ConsoleLogger.

member.name: P:NReco.Logging.File.FileLoggerOptions.FileSizeLimitBytes
member.summary: Determines max size of the one log file.
member.remarks: If log file limit is specified logger will create new file when limit is reached. For example, if log file name is 'test.log', logger will create 'test1.log', 'test2.log' etc.

member.name: P:NReco.Logging.File.FileLoggerOptions.MaxRollingFiles
member.summary: Determines max number of log files if is specified.
member.remarks: If MaxRollingFiles is specified file logger will re-write previously created log files. For example, if log file name is 'test.log' and max files = 3, logger will use: 'test.log', then 'test1.log', then 'test2.log' and then 'test.log' again (old content is removed).

member.name: P:NReco.Logging.File.FileLoggerOptions.FormatLogFileName
member.summary: Custom formatter for the log file name.
member.remarks: By specifying custom formatting handler you can define your own criteria for creation of log files.
